name: kopia
description: Kopia is an open source backup tool for files and snapshots. It supports encryption, deduplication and multiple storage backends, with both CLI and web UI, enabling safe incremental backups on self hosted infrastructure.

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: End-to-end AES-256 encryption with password or key-based protection. Secure your backup data completely

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Fast incremental backups that only store changed data. Minimize backup time and storage

features.title: Snapshot Management
features.description: Create point-in-time snapshots with retention policies. Maintain backup history efficiently

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Browser-based interface for backup management and monitoring. Manage backups visually
